title: The Isle of Rhum
creator_credit: Films of Scotland and Christopher Mylne
brief_description: A film about the Hebridean Island off the coast of Scotland. Here wild natural beauty contrasts with the Edwardian elegance of Kinlock Castle, the Nature Conservancy’s most ambitious experiment.
description: A film about the Hebridean Island off the coast of Scotland. Here wild natural beauty contrasts with the Edwardian elegance of Kinlock Castle, the Nature Conservancy’s most ambitious experiment.
